td.content: s:a white m geographer aged 34 years presents with mild cramping. patient also reports mild nausea, mild diarrhea, Stomach. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 60.1 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 94, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed sertraline - 100 mg daily, and ordered CBC.

s:pt presents with mild nausea of 8 days duration together with mild cramping, mild diarrhea. pt is a white male geographer aged 35 ys. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 60.5 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed fluoxetine - 20 mg daily, and ordered CBC.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
